title: w/ Preston Sprinkle Conservative Churches and the Gay Liberation Movement
description:
Preston Sprinkle is back. He's a theologian, speaker, author and one of the areas he speaks, writes and consults on is churches struggling with the LGBTQ community. He's been tracking my series so we settle in for a long conversation on the topic. Hope you can gain some wisdom from it. 

People to be Loved https://amzn.to/2U8afFq
Center for Faith, Sexuality and Gender https://www.centerforfaith.com/blog/what-do-we-actually-know-about-sexual-orientation-part-1

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/jdVk8XU 

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333
